alert.note: Alert for Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 11:43AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Windham, east central Tolland, southeastern Worcester, southwestern Norfolk and Providence Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1140 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hampton, or 7 miles northwest of Plainfield, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Providence, Pawtucket, East Providence, Woonsocket, Coventry, Cumberland, North Providence, Johnston, Mansfield, Windham, Plainfield, Attleboro, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, Killingly, Bellingham, Burrillville, Seekonk and Uxbridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT for northern Connecticut...central Massachusetts...and Rhode Island.
